default_messages: Hey, are you there? I'm feeling really overwhelmed today.
I spent 4 hours on my SOP for Waterloo but it still sounds trash.
My professor hasn't replied to my LoR email yet. It's been a week.
Do you think I should just give up on the top tier unis?
Anyway, I watched the new Solo Leveling episode to distract myself.
Jin Woo is so cool, I wish I could just 'level up' in real life.
I forgot to eat lunch again. My mom is gonna kill me if she finds out.
Can you remind me to email Dr. Harrison tomorrow morning?
I hate writing email drafts. It makes me so anxious.
Also, I need to fix the bug in my MARL project. The agents aren't coordinating.
Sometimes I feel like I'm not good enough for a PhD.
My bank balance is low, application fees are killing me.
I did have a good gym session today though. Hit a PR on deadlifts.
Listening to some Lo-Fi beats helps me focus, but not today.
Do you think AI will replace researchers eventually?
I want to work on medical AI because my grandpa had cancer.
That's why I'm so stressed. I want to make a difference.
Ugh, my laptop battery is dying. Just like my motivation lol.
I need a coffee. A double espresso specifically.
What if I don't get in anywhere? What's my backup plan?
Maybe I should just apply to safe schools in Europe.
TU Delft looks good, but the housing crisis there is scary.
I miss playing Valorant with the boys. Haven't played in months.
Okay, I'm spiraling. Help me calm down.
I need to structure my thoughts for the research proposal.
Topic: Curriculum learning for multi-agent systems.
I think I'll sleep early tonight. 11 PM.
Actually make that 2 AM, I have too much to do.
Thanks for listening. You're better than my real friends sometimes.
Goodnight.
